Collaborators

The lab maintains active and extensive research collaborations with:
Joshua Cashaback | Department of Biomedical Engineering, University of Delaware
Brad Mckay | Milwaukee Brewers
Jonathan Cannon | Department of Psychology, Neuroscience, and Behaviour, McMaster University

Some of our other collaborators include:
Keith Lohse | Department of Neurology, Washington University School of Medicine in Saint Louis
Matthew Miller | School of Kinesiology, Auburn University
Mariane Bacelar | Department of Kinesiology, Boise State University
